resources.string: andlytics collects data over time. to see a meaningful chart come back as soon as more data is available.\n\nusually download stats are updated every 24-48 hours.

Andlytics donate / pro key unlocks the additional features change notification as well as statistics data export and import.

Please notice that Google doesn't provide a stable API to get the numbers. Therefore Andlytics might not work properly if there are changes in the Android Market.

In that case we try to catch up with the changes but we can't guarantee that the app works properly in the future.

Not available in: Bulgaria Estonia Greece Hungary Kazakhstan Latvia Lithuania Luxembourg Philippines Romania Serbia Slovakia Slovenia South Africa Thailand

An unexpected error occurred.

Please help us to fix this by sending us error report data. Information about the error (stacktrace) and information about your device such as device manufacturer's name, device model number, operating system, etc. will be sent to help us identifying the problem.

Thanks!

An unexpected error occurred, probably because the remote interface changed.

But the good news is that a new version of Andlytics is available in the Android Market.

Please update before reporting this issue.

Thanks!
Please choose or add a Google account. The account must be a registered developer account with apps published in the Android Market (\'Google Apps for Business\' accounts are not supported yet).
Existing export files will be replaced
long click on comment for translation
The number of comments reported on the main screen may be higher than the number of comments shown here because of withdrawn / changed comments.
Values for downloads and active installs are not updated on a daily basis by Google. You can choose to smooth these values. Ratings are not affected as they update nearly instantly.
If auto synchronization is disabled graph views will probably miss future values
Remove AdMob values for this app
select AdMob site to associate with this app
For AdMob accounts that are linked to a Google account you can find the API password on the admob account information page:
Please help us to improve this app by providing feedback. \n\nThank you!
